msbt.message: All's well that ends well, as they say. I don't wanna end with any regrets, so I'm partyin' all night!
Next year's comin' up quick! You got your New Year's resolutions ready?
I used to panic around New Year's. Too much to do, not enough time! I'm a lot calmer about it now.I figure the year's gonna end no matter what, so I may as well just let all that stress go, !
It's kinda sad watching the year end sometimes. But I just love those New Year feelings, y'know?
'Sup, New Year's hat buddy? Can't welcome the New Year without one. Just wearin' it gets me revved up!
Looking spiffy! Love the hat! You feelin' ready for the New Year?The Countdown party is the last big bash of the year, so we gotta send it off in style!
Hey there! Like my New Year's hat? They're selling 'em cheap over in the plaza, !You oughta get one. They're perfect for gettin' in the party mood. Plus, it'd look so rad on you!
Where's your New Year's hat? The Countdown only comes once a year.C'mon, you gotta get festive!
I know it's New Year's when I see everyone in those silly hats.Bwa ha ha! They're silly, but I love 'em, anyway! One sec, I gotta put mine on.
You're totally rocking that New Year's Hat! I actually just got one. Wonder if it fits
Oh yeah! I'm really feelin' this hat. Bring on that Countdown, and bring on the new year, !
The Countdown party's gonna start soon. Time to rock our New Year's hats!
The Countdown's comin' up soon! You got your New Year's hat? Time to show it off!
Bwa ha ha! These hats are so silly. I can't help loving 'em!You got your New Year's hat yet? They're selling 'em cheap over in the plaza. Go, go, go!
I always get the jitters before my New Year's all-nighter. I'm just not used to seein' everyone up so late!
New Year's just ain't real to me till I put on the hat, .Whew! Not long till the big Countdown! You ready?
Wow, just flew by. That's gotta mean it was a good one, right?
Bwa ha ha! We look so silly in these New Year's hats.Less than 30 minutes till the new year! I am so hyped, !
Here we are! The year's ending, I got my New Year's hat on, I'm feelin' radNow all I gotta do is start the new year with a big ol' goofy grin!
The Countdown's gonna start any minute now. You gonna put on your hat?C'mon! It's the last day of the year. Time to get silly, !
The new year's so close I can taste it! You stoked? I'm stoked.Oh, hey! Did you get a New Year's hat? They're selling 'em in the plaza. Go get one, !
Sayin' goodbye to the year is kinda sad, but it's also a ton of fun sayin' hi to the next.Oh! I almost forgot my New Year's hat, . Thanks for the reminder!
The end of the year's always so chaotic, but then suddenly it's time and everything's just sochill.Oh, hey! Don't tell anyone, but I'm totally gonna copy you on the hat- wearing thing.
Ah! Much better. OK, I'm ready. Bring on that Countdown!
Almost time for the Countdown! I bought a New Year's hat from a stall in the plaza. Wanna see?
The Countdown's starting soon! You ready to rock the new year?I ALMOST am. Still one thing to do
Ahh! That just feels right. NOW I'm ready! How 'bout you? Wanna be hat-twins, ?Ha! I am SO excited! C'mooon, New Year!
:! The new year's gettin' close enough to touch! I cannot wait!
Ready or not, the new year's nearly here, !
Alright! New year, new chance to make the most of it. You ready? I am so ready!
Hey, , thanks for making this year rock. Seriously.<10_7 arg="120" />
We gotta keep the party goin' in the new year, !<10_7 arg="120" />
I'm feelin' a bit lazy, so I'll be ringin' in the new year from home.WellI say lazy, but cleaning my place was actually a ton of work, .Whatever! I got a fancy hat on and you're here. Time to party!
Less than an hour to go till the big Countdown! They're gonna do fireworks outside, if you wanna see.Me? I'm just gonna party indoors tonight. Bring on the new year!
:! Less than an hour till the Countdown! Guess it's too late to find a last-minute party. That's fine. I'm gonna greet the new year from home. It's as good a place as any, !
The new year's comin' up quick! You gonna check out the fireworks when they start?
I was gonna spend the Countdown solo, but I'm actually stoked you came by. Almost time!We gotta make next year extra- gnarly. Whatever it takes! Deal?
The Countdown's flyin' toward us. We've gotta party as hard as we can and leave this year in the dust!
Whoa! The Countdown's not even five minutes away! I've been waiting for this all year! I am so revved up!
The Countdown's about to start! The new year's gonna be so rad. And when I say rad, I mean RAD!
The Countdown's almost here. Let's go! Let's go!Oh, hey! You sure you wanna miss the fireworks outside?
It's gonna be a year to remember!<10_7 arg="120" />
You really made this year rock, !<10_7 arg="120" />
Whoa! Those fireworks are rockin'! The sky's like a big flower garden!You just can't beat welcoming the new year with fireworks, can you, ?
Those fireworks are so rad. They don't say "happy" New Year for nothin'! Bwa ha ha! This is great!We're totally gonna rock this year, !
Whew! Made it to another year in one piece. That's a relief! Let's make sure this year rocks, !
Check out those fireworks! This whole island's in party mode! The energy here's amazing!
What a Countdown! I was totally gettin' chills, .
There's a stall in the plaza that's open till dawn. You gonna check it out, ?
Got any New Year's resolutions? Mine's the same as it always is— make every day rock!
Ha! It's party mayhem! I can't wait to see what the rest of the year'll be like, !
Gotta love the chill feel of ringin' in the new year from home, .
How was it lookin' out there? The plaza seemed like it was rockin' when I checked, .I just kicked back and watched from home. So far this year's been really chill. Hope I can keep it that way!
Here we are in ! Doing the Countdown indoors totally rocked.
It's tough to beat a lazy New Year's Eve at home. But as soon as that sun's up, I'm goin' full throttle!
Have things calmed down yet? I was thinking of going out, .
I thought tonight of all nights I oughta go out and party, but at the last second, I just said "nah."
I hear a stall in the plaza's goin' till morning. You could still get a party popper if you want!
Didja like the Countdown? Every year I get revved up, and every year it rocks. So much fun!
